WORK EXPERIENCE
Jan/2025 - Present
Associate Data Scientist
• Enhanced information extraction accuracy by implementing a RAG archi-
tecture with LLM optimization, prompt engineering, and AWS OpenSearch
hybrid vector search.
• Automated payroll data extraction from diverse ﬁle formats using Google
Cloud Document AI to streamline data ingestion for UI applications.
• Developed ML models on Databricks and engineered automated data
processing workﬂows utilizing AWS Lambda, S3, and Step Functions.
• Optimized end-to-end classiﬁcation pipelines with pandas and scikit-
learn, integrating XGBoost and Random Forest to boost model accuracy
and inference efﬁciency.

nAI models) for sentiment analysis and topic modeling based on system
feedback; models are now in production to monitor application metrics of
U.S. users.

Data Engineer Intern - Lojas Renner SA

and gold data layers within a medallion architecture for large-scale datasets
and building data pipelines using Azure Data Factory.

tronomical datasets from SLOAN observatory.
